name: The Jungle (itch)
description:
Can you escape the jungle?

Be sure to play the download if you want to compete for the best time on the leaderboards! The Jungle is a puzzle platformer where you turn into the creatures you kill! Fastest route to the exit portal wins. 

W - Up

A - Left

D - Right

Left Mouse Button or Spacebar = Attack

R- Restart

ESC- Back to Main Menu
